TopicTitle: looking for a time controlling mod for 0.9

Articles.Content:
I'm playing around with the **outer planets mod** and **Planet factory.** Some of the planets are ridiculously far, as in, 40 years away. I don't really want to mess with modded parts or engines, so i rather just speed up the pace of time beyond stock ksp limitations.

I saw a mod that already does this: **StarSystems**, so i'm wondering if there's a standalone mod for time control that i can implement with the outer planets and planet factory.
You could also just do other things while you are waiting (fly to another planet, build a space station, go mining for kethane/karbonite, etc.) There is so much you can get done in that time span.
